## Chapter 12.3 Question 15

Find the first and second partial derivatives for the function $f(x,y) = \sin x \cos y$.

$\begin{aligned}
f_x(x,y) & = \cos x \cos y \\
f_y(x,y) & = -\sin x \sin y \\
f_{xx}(x,y) & = -\sin x \cos y \\
f_{yy}(x,y) & = -\sin x \cos y \\
f_{xy}(x,y) & = -\cos x \sin y \\
f_{yx}(x,y) & = -\cos x \sin y
\end{aligned}$
